messages.messageBody:
<<<< "I don't have to outrun the bear, I just have to outrun *you*!">>>>>

Bwaaahaaaahaaaa!!!!

Julie S.----whose probably too slow to catch any of you these days

From: <SandraDodd@...>
To: <UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com>

Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Julie S. is wonderful


>

>
> << Julie S.---who will absolutely strangle the next person who says she is
> wonderful<<<
>
> <<But Julie, we ALL think you are wonderful!! >>
>
> Ah yes, she can't strangle us all at once.
>
> In case anyone missed it, two guys were awakened by an angry bear
thrashing
> their campsite, and while one whispered "Oh no! what are we going to do!
that
> bear will kill us! Holy shit. We need a plan!" the other was just
putting
> on his hiking books and lacing them up, taking his time to do it really
> thoroughly, tying good knots, and not saying a word.
>
> "Do you think you can outrun a BEAR!?"
>
> "I don't have to outrun the bear, I just have to outrun *you*!"

messages.subject: Julie S. is wonderful
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/22/04 5:02:05 AM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/22/04 5:02:05 AM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< Julie S.---who will absolutely strangle the next person who says she is
wonderful<<<

<<But Julie, we ALL think you are wonderful!! >>

Ah yes, she can't strangle us all at once.

In case anyone missed it, two guys were awakened by an angry bear thrashing
their campsite, and while one whispered "Oh no! what are we going to do! that
bear will kill us! Holy shit. We need a plan!" the other was just putting
on his hiking books and lacing them up, taking his time to do it really
thoroughly, tying good knots, and not saying a word.

"Do you think you can outrun a BEAR!?"

"I don't have to outrun the bear, I just have to outrun *you*!"
